sentence: Wisconsin state Treasurer Sarah Godlewski is focusing on drug prices in her new TV ad, criticizing both GOP Sen. Ron Johnson and her fellow Democrats.
title: Ketanji Brown Jackson's sleepy confirmation fight finally wakes up
